summary: This document is the Operating Agreement for New York Strategy Group, LLC, established by Darren K. Indyke. It outlines the formation, management, and operational guidelines of the company, including capital contributions, membership interests, and indemnification provisions for members.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is the sole member of New York Strategy Group, LLC, and is responsible for the management and operational decisions of the company.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, New York 10022
keyFacts: The company was organized as a New York limited liability company on January 13, 2000.
Darren K. Indyke holds a 100% membership interest in the company.
The company has elected to be treated as a Corporation for federal and state income tax purposes.
The company is member-managed, with decisions made by the Sole Member.
The agreement includes provisions for indemnification of the Sole Member and other members.
